name: The Ultimate Movie Characters Quiz | Name the Player

questions.text: William Wallace (1995), Detective Sergeant Martin Riggs (1987) and Max Rockatansky (1979)?
questions.explanation:
Mel Gibson & Gibson.

	Mel Gibson in 'Braveheart', 'Lethal Weapon' and 'Mad Max'.

questions.text: John Bernard Books (1976), U.S. Marshal Reuben J. 'Rooster' Cogburn (1969) and Sheriff John T. Chance (1959)?
questions.explanation:
John Wayne & Wayne.

	John Wayne in 'The Shootist', 'True Grit' and 'Rio Bravo'.

questions.text: Travis Bickle (1976), Jake La Motta (1980) and Max Cady (1991)?
questions.explanation:
Robert De Niro & De Niro.

	Robert De Niro in 'Taxi Driver', 'Raging Bull' and 'Cape Fear'.

questions.text: Dr. Hannibal Lecter (1991), Prof. Abraham Van Helsing (1992) and Dr. Frederick Treves (1980)?
questions.explanation:
Anthony Hopkin & Hopkins.

	Anthony Hopkins in 'The Silence of the Lambs', 'Bram Stoker's Dracula' and 'The Elephant Man'.

questions.text: Dick Steele: Agent WD40 (1996), Lieutenant Frank Drebin (1988) and Dr. Rumack (1980)?
questions.explanation:
Leslie Nielsen & Nielsen.

	Leslie Nielsen in 'Spy Hard', 'The Naked Gun' and 'Airplane'.

questions.text: The Girl (1955), Sugar Kane Kowalczyk (1959) and Roslyn Taber (1961)?
questions.explanation:
Marilyn Monroe & Monroe.

	Marilyn Monroe in 'The Seven Year Itch', 'Some Like It Hot' and 'The Misfits'.

questions.text: Linus Larrabee (1995), Rick Deckard (1982) and Han Solo (1977)?
questions.explanation:
Harrison Ford & Ford.

	Harrison Ford in 'Sabrina', 'Blade Runner' and 'Star Wars'.

questions.text: Catwoman and Selina Kyle (1992), Sukie Ridgemont (1987) and Frankie (1991)?
questions.explanation:
Michelle Pfeiffer & Pfeiffer.

	Michelle Pfeiffer in 'Batman Returns', 'The Witches of Eastwick' and 'Frankie and Johnny'.

questions.text: Capt. Gavin Stewart (1980), Garald Bradley-Smith and Sir John Bevistock (1990) and James Bond (1983)?
questions.explanation:
Roger Moore & Moore.

	Roger Moore in 'The Sea Wolves', 'Bullseye' and 'Octopussy'.

questions.text: Stanley Ipkiss (1994), Lloyd Christmas (1994) and The Riddler and Edward Nygma (1995)?
questions.explanation:
Jim Carrey & Carrey.

	Jim Carrey in 'The Mask', 'Dumb and Dumber' and 'Batman Forever'.

questions.text: Edward D. Wood Jr (1994), Edward Scissorhands (1990) and Gilbert Grape (1993)?
questions.explanation:
Johnny Depp & Depp.

	Johnny Depp in 'Ed Wood', 'Johnny Scissorhands' and 'What's Eating Gilbert Grape'.

questions.text: Jim Malone (1987), Professor Henry Jones (1989) and Jessie (1989)?
questions.explanation:
Sean Connery & Connery.

	Sean Connery in 'The Untouchables', 'Indiana Jones and the Last Crusade' and 'Family Business'.

questions.text: Joseph Donnelly (1992), Cole Trickle (1990) and Ethan Hunt (1996)?
questions.explanation:
Tom Cruise & Cruise.

	Tom Cruise in 'Far and Away', 'Days of Thunder' and 'Mission: Impossible'.

questions.text: Black Knight and Sir Lancelot (1975), Archibald 'Archie' Leech (1988) and Brian Stimpson (1986)?
questions.explanation:
John Cleese & Cleese.

	John Cleese in 'Monty Python and the Holy Grail', 'A Fish Called Wanda' and 'Clockwise'.

questions.text: Jim Lovell (1995), Samuel 'Sam' Baldwin (1993) and Andrew Beckett (1993)?
questions.explanation:
Tom Hanks & Hanks.

	Tom Hanks in 'Apollo 13', 'Sleepless in Seattle' and 'Philadelphia'.

questions.text: Arthur Bach (1981), George Webber (1979) and Patch (1985)?
questions.explanation:
Dudley Moore & Moore.

	Dudley Moore in 'Arthur', '10' and 'Santa Claus: The Movie'.

questions.text: Rachel Flax (1990), Alexandra Medford (1987) and Loretta Castorini (1987)?
questions.explanation:
Cher.

	Cher in 'Mermaids', 'The Witches of Eastwick' and 'Moonstruck'.

questions.text: Miss Vida Boheme (1995), Johnny Castle (1987) and Sam Wheat (1990)?
questions.explanation:
Patrick Swayze & Swayze.

	Patrick Swayze in 'To Wong Foo, Thanks For Everything', 'Dirty Dancing' and 'Ghost'.

questions.text: Professor Inigo Tinkle (1970), Francis Bigger (1968) and Lurcio (1971)?
questions.explanation:
Frankie Howerd & Howerd.

	Frankie Howerd in 'Carry On up the Jungle', 'Carry On Doctor' and 'Up Pompeii'.

questions.text: Charles (1994), Rev. Anthony Campion (1994) and Meredith Potter (1995)?
questions.explanation:
Hugh Grant & Grant.

	Hugh Grant in 'Four Weddings and a Funeral', 'Sirens' and 'An Awfully Big Adventure'.

questions.text: Jerry and Daphne (1959), Felix Unger (1968) and John Gustafson (1993)?
questions.explanation:
Jack Lemmon & Lemmon.

	Jack Lemmon in 'Some Like It Hot', 'The Odd Couple' and 'Grumpy Old Men'.

questions.text: Jett Rink (1956), Jim Stark (1955) and Cal Trask (1955)?
questions.explanation:
James Dean & Dean.

	James Dean in 'Giant', 'Rebel Without a Cause' and 'East of Eden'.

questions.text: John Robie (1955), Mortimer Brewster (1944) and Roger O. Thornhill and George Kaplan?
questions.explanation:
Cary Grant & Grant.

	Cary Grant in 'To Catch a Thief', 'Arsenic and Old Lace' and 'North by NorthWest'.

questions.text: Hans Christian Andersen (1952), Phil Davis (1954) and Walter Mitty (1947)?
questions.explanation:
Danny Kaye & Kaye.

	Danny Kaye in 'Hans Christian Andersen', 'White Christmas' and 'The Secret Life of Walter Mitty'.

questions.text: Bill Boosey (1970), Gladstone Screwer (1969) and Rumpo Kid (1965)
questions.explanation:
Sid James & James.

	Sid James in 'Carry On Up the Jungle', 'Carry On Again Doctor' and 'Carry On Cowboy'. Hope you enjoyed the quiz.
